descriptionHTML:
Reactions brings social interaction to life by having reactions recorded as videos are viewed. Simply post a video and watch your friends/fans react. Get ready to be entertained!

✓ Be on stage:
When you create and post content through the app, the experience is like seeing your audiences' reactions in real life.


✓ Be in the spotlight:
See and be seen. Feel the excitement as you are about to watch a video - you are unaware of the content and are placed ‘in the spotlight’ with the camera focusing on you. By having your reaction recorded to a video you are able to UNLOCK others’ reactions to the same video!


✓ How to use?
Give and get reactions.


✓ What you want to see?
Follow, invite and interact with your friends. Explore staff picks, celebrities, comedians, and much more.


✓ Creating content:
Shoot a video or simply upload from your camera roll.


✓ Keep it personal:
You can also send direct video messages to friends and capture their reactions to your content.


Like, LOL, OMG - WTF! :-)
After Reactions, when you look back the excitement you felt when counting LIKES, it will seem so bizarre...


We love to hear your feedback! Drop us a line at support@reactions.me
comments: 1. I put my number in and your app is saying it is wrong 2. Why do u need my number for?? 3. I see ppl saying the same thing in the comments 4. Why are u not fixing it 5. Disappointing.. It always says that i have no Internet connection on the username choosing screen.. And i do have a connection.. So i can't use it.. Using galaxy s7

Please fix the code/sign in problems I'm able to put my phone number in flawlessly then I wait for the code before I could even put it in it advances to the next screen asking for a username and then says no network connection when in fact I do have a network connection via Wi-Fi or I would not be able to post this please fix and I will rate 5 stars
It works... Now it's broken unusable :( Integration with wear is great very impressed. Please fix this it's useless now
It doesn't work This won't work unless I verify a phone number which I don't have one, Reactions.me if you can fix this problem I will rate it 5 stars
Stupid Each time I try to put my phone number in it says failed to connect to server
recentChanges: - New! you can now post videos uploaded from your device
